import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react' import './form.scss' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/logo.svg' import UiDivider from '../divider/Divider' const options = [ { key: 'm', text: 'Male', value: 'male' }, { key: 'f', text: 'Female', value: 'female' }, { key: 'o', text: 'Other', value: 'other' }, ] class FinalForm extends Component { state = {} handleChange = (e, { value }) => this.setState({ value }) render() { const { value } = this.state return (
We're sorry to see you go! We will miss you!
Submit
) } } export default FinalForm
